Media Usage

In Progress

Visualizing My Technology Usage

This is the second project from my introductory studio course. We are tasked with visualizing our media usage in four different ways. I decided to go with a coherent, understandable (and simple) design. I am still iterating over these projects. For example, I don't think starting my line chart bottom axis at 40 is a good idea. I'll probably just get rid of the axes altogether, since I have all the numbers represented. I will have the completed projects uploaded at the end of the semester.
